metadata.description: For someone who thoroughly deserves a whacking with a wet trout.
metadata.message: :fish: **Whack DESTINATION!** you've been whacked with a wet trout.

metadata.description: Tap someone who deserves it with a slimy minnow.
For someone who has been trouted, but might deserve some thanks at the same time.
metadata.message: :fries: **Crunch, crunch DESTINATION!** Here is some chips to go with your fish!

metadata.description: For someone who has over-, incorrectly, or self-righteously trouted others.
metadata.message: :firecracker: **Sizzle DESTINATION!** The trout you used to slap another user has been gutted, roasted over the coals, and served with tartar sauce.

metadata.description: For someone who made a bigger than trout mistake.
metadata.message: :whale2: **Smash DESTINATION!** You've just been squished by a whale!

metadata.description: For someone who has overused or misused /whale.
metadata.message: :bento: **Yum! Delicious! Thanks DESTINATION!** Your whale used to squish me has been sliced and served as some Japanese sashimi.

metadata.description: For someone who deserves a stink bomb for whatever reason.
metadata.message: :bomb: Pee-ew DESTINATION! You've just been stink bombed!

metadata.description: For someone who stinkbombed you for no reason.
metadata.message: :satellite_orbital: **Kaboom DESTINATION!** The stink bomb you used to make another user smell has been taken to a remote place and blown up with explosives.

metadata.description: For someone who has said something that is *far too silly* and needs to stop now.
metadata.message: :stop_sign: DESTINATION... **Right! Stop that!** It's far too silly!

metadata.description: For someone who did something silly.
metadata.message: :tropical_fish: SOURCE slaps DESTINATION around a bit with a large trout.

metadata.description: For someone who needs more than a single trout but not a whale.
metadata.message: :fish: :blowfish: :tropical_fish: **Whack, smack, thwack DESTINATION!** You have been whacked with a hover of wet trouts.
